personal.name: Reinette Fritz
personal.title: Marketing Coordinator & Digital Strategist
personal.tagline: Creating engaging marketing experiences through strategy, design, and data insights

hero.name: Reinette Fritz
description: Versatile marketing professional with expertise in digital campaigns, event coordination, and creative design. I combine data-driven insights with engaging storytelling to create measurable marketing impact.

Currently leading digital marketing initiatives at Love Howick while mastering graphic design. With a Psychology background and proven track record of driving growth (329% e-commerce increase, 25% SEO improvement, 22% social media growth), I'm passionate about understanding consumer behavior and creating authentic marketing experiences.

about.pageTagline: Marketing professional passionate about strategy, creativity, and driving measurable results through authentic engagement

sections.title: Who I Am
content: I'm Reinette Fritz, a marketing coordinator with a passion for creating engaging experiences that connect brands with their audiences. With a Psychology degree and hands-on experience across digital, traditional, and event marketing, I understand what drives consumer behavior and builds lasting relationships.

Currently leading digital marketing at Love Howick, managing multi-channel campaigns while developing my graphic design skills. I'm detail-oriented, strategic, and genuinely excited about solving marketing challenges through creativity and data.

sections.title: What I Do
sections.intro: I design and execute integrated marketing strategies across multiple channels:
list: Digital Marketing: SEO, SEM, social media campaigns (Facebook, Instagram, TikTok), Google Ads
Event Coordination: Planning and executing major events (golf days, conferences, community expos)
Content Creation: Copywriting, design, and newsletters
Financial Management: Budgeting, cost analysis, and financial reporting
CRM & Analytics: Data management, performance tracking, and optimization
E-commerce & Website Management: Product listings, SEO optimization, online sales growth
Design & Creative: Layout design, presentations, and marketing materials (Canva, graphic design)

sections.title: My Approach
content: I believe great marketing combines strategic thinking with creative execution. Every campaign should be grounded in consumer insights, measured by clear KPIs, and delivered with attention to detail.

I'm bilingual (English & Afrikaans), highly organized, and thrive in fast-paced environments where I can wear multiple hats. I love collaborating across teams, learning new tools, and continuously optimizing for results.

items.title: Marketing, Partnerships & Systems Admin
items.description: Sole marketing lead managing digital content across platforms, event coordination (Golf Day, Business Breakfasts, Mandela Day), website maintenance, and donor relations. Designing marketing materials and managing data systems.

items.title: Marketing Coordinator
items.description: Managed annual marketing budget, digital campaigns, social media, product launches, and traditional marketing. Achieved 25% SEO improvement and 22% social media growth.

items.title: Marketing Admin Coordinator
items.description: Coordinated events and trade shows, managed CRM data, oversaw e-commerce operations achieving 329% online sales increase. Handled financial tracking and supplier relationships.

items.title: Vehicle Stock Controller & Invoicing
items.description: Managed vehicle inventory, conducted audits, created financial reports, and managed Instagram content for sales. 5 years of experience in organized operations.

currentFocus.title: Current Focus
currentFocus.intro: I'm focused on leveraging my diverse marketing expertise to:
list: Drive digital growth through integrated multi-channel campaigns
Create authentic brand storytelling grounded in consumer insights
Optimize marketing performance through data-driven decision making
Master graphic design to enhance creative marketing capabilities
Lead event strategy that creates measurable business impact

projects.pageTagline: Selected campaigns and projects demonstrating strategy, creativity, and results.

blog.pageTagline: Thoughts on marketing, creativity, and digital growth.

contact.pageTagline: Whether you need help with marketing strategy, event coordination, or creative campaigns — I'd love to connect and explore opportunities.

aboutPreview.intro: I'm a marketing coordinator passionate about creating authentic brand experiences through strategy, creativity, and data-driven insights.
paragraphs: With a Psychology background and hands-on experience across digital, traditional, and event marketing, I understand consumer behavior and how to create campaigns that resonate. From SEO optimization and social media management to event coordination and financial planning, I bring a versatile skillset to every project.

Currently leading digital marketing at Love Howick while mastering graphic design. My proven track record includes 329% e-commerce growth, 25% SEO improvement, and consistent high performance scores. I'm detail-oriented, strategic, and excited about solving real marketing challenges.
